title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\CommuteFilter
name: CommuteFilter
description:
Parameters needed for commute search.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.CommuteFilter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.commute_method
params.description: Required. The method of transportation to calculate the commute time for.

params.name: data.start_coordinates
params.description: Required. The latitude and longitude of the location to calculate the commute time from.

params.name: data.travel_duration
params.description: Required. The maximum travel time in seconds. The maximum allowed value is 3600s (one hour). Format is 123s.

params.name: data.allow_imprecise_addresses
params.description: If true, jobs without street level addresses may also be returned. For city level addresses, the city center is used. For state and coarser level addresses, text matching is used. If this field is set to false or isn't specified, only jobs that include street level addresses will be returned by commute search.

params.name: data.road_traffic
params.description: Specifies the traffic density to use when calculating commute time.

params.name: data.departure_time
params.description: The departure time used to calculate traffic impact, represented as [google.type.TimeOfDay][google.type.TimeOfDay] in local time zone. Currently traffic model is restricted to hour level resolution.

methods.name: getAllowImpreciseAddresses
methods.description:
If true, jobs without street level addresses may also be returned.

For city level addresses, the city center is used. For state and coarser level addresses, text matching is used. If this field is set to false or isn't specified, only jobs that include street level addresses will be returned by commute search.

Generated from protobuf field bool allow_imprecise_addresses = 4;
